definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
lit. spider's thread and horse track/tiny hints (of a secret)/traces/clue

sentences.english: End uses of warp knitted fabrics from glass filament.
sentences.chinese: 玻纖復絲經編針織物的用途。

sentences.english: At noon, Dorothy unlocked the rest-room door and discovered that he was gone.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午，託羅絲找開廁所的門，卻發現它不見了。

sentences.english: Ultra-structure of symbiosis mycorrhizal between cymbidium goeringii and rhizoctonia sp.
sentences.chinese: 春蘭與絲核菌共生菌根及結構研究。

sentences.english: Cut the cabbage into fine long shreds.
sentences.chinese: 將捲心菜切成又細又長的絲。

sentences.english: I've ordered savory pork and cole slaw.
sentences.chinese: 我點了鹹豬肉和涼拌生菜絲。

sentences.english: The experimental results of the creeping effect for aluminium field wire are reported.
sentences.chinese: 報道了對鋁場絲蠕變效應研究的結果。

sentences.english: What are you guys doing over there?
Her hair was black and long and silken and whirled about as did her body.
sentences.chinese: 她有黑色絲般的長髮，和她的身體一樣盤旋着。

sentences.english: Wire doll under its small shape like a large thin silk covering of the baby, hence the name.
sentences.chinese: 絲娃娃因其形狀上大下小猶如薄絲包的嬰兒，故名。

sentences.english: A real winner since 1979, we combine Vanilla-flavored and Chocolate ice creams with a caramel ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 香草冰淇淋和巧克力冰淇淋加上焦糖絲。

sentences.english: Add in black fungus,bell pepper and carrots.
sentences.chinese: 隨放木耳，青椒絲和胡蘿蔔絲大火翻炒。

sentences.english: Add in black fungus,bell pepper and carrots.
sentences.chinese: 隨放木耳，青椒絲和胡蘿蔔絲大火翻炒。

sentences.english: Ribbon lakes and bogs are present throughout the area, created by depressions left by receding glaciers.
sentences.chinese: 冰川退化後形成的絲帶狀的湖泊和沼澤遍佈這一地區。

sentences.english: She waited patiently for Frances to finish.
sentences.chinese: 她耐心地等弗朗西絲弄完。

sentences.english: It was the final irony of Missy's life.
sentences.chinese: 這是對米絲一生的最後嘲諷。

definition: strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
